steps.name: Making Details API Request with the role and payload
Setting up the BASE URI, Content Type as Application/JSON with ROLE and attaching senitiveDataFilter
Getting property value from property file
Getting the Auth token for the role
Expecting the response to have Content Type as Application/JSON, Status 200 and Response Time less than 1000ms

labels.name: story
labels.value: Job details should be shown correctly
